body:
Timezone depends on the date, according to 2015b version of tzdata:
# Zone  NAME            GMTOFF  RULES   FORMAT  [UNTIL]
Zone America/New_York   -4:56:02 -         LMT     1883 Nov 18 12:03:58
                                         -5:00   US         E%sT    1920
                                         -5:00   NYC       E%sT    1942
                                         -5:00   US         E%sT    1946
                                         -5:00   NYC       E%sT    1967
                                         -5:00   US         E%sT

New York uses a -4:56:02 local mean time before 1883 Nov 18, in your
example, the date (Jan 1st 0000) is way earlier than year 1883.

It's working as intended.
